website_summaries.verdict: This large pellet grill may not work for all consumers' needs or budgets, but it's worth considering for anyone who plans to cook for large groups.
pros: Large hopper is made for preparing lots of food at once, as it offers multiple racks and more than 800 square inches of cook space
Has a digital display and meat probe
cons: Price falls on the higher end of the spectrum

customer_reviews.title: This grill/smoker is a steal!! Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Been using grills/smokers for about 30 years and this is the best I have ever had. The wood pellet feeder with electronic control makes keeping maintain a constant temperature effortless. Tried boston butt, ribs and salmon so far and all have come out excellent. Great quality and craftsmanship. A grill/smoker of this quality usually costs much more. Highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J. Aucoin

customer_reviews.title: The temp runs higher than the setting about 10 to 25 degrees higher
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the quality of the grill. Easy to put together but a little time consuming. As for using it especially for a 1st time user of pellet grills. Was a bit confusing for the setting from smoke to cooking. I prefer more smoke amd bought a smoking tube. But when cooming on low temp had only a quarter of the grill with head and the rest with little to no heat very indirect heat. Possibly to do with the drip pan. But over all it's a decent grill for the price especially with size. I put 2 briskets and 2 pork butts and that was without the 2nd rack.
customer_reviews.author: Nero

customer_reviews.title: Quality, Service, and Bang for you Buck equals Ozark Grills!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a worn out Rectec Grill with the Bison. The quality Of the Bison is second to none. Have had it for 90 days and without question the best wood pellet grill on the market today; especially for the price. Our family could not be happier! Best steaks on the planet when grilled with the Bison. Had the pleasure to talk with Robert. Helpful and professional! If your looking for the best homemade Steaks and Barbecue, Get a wood pellet grill land take a good hard look at the Ozark Brand! You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron or Debbie

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: this is a really well built smoker. It is easy to use and does a great job as a smoker or as a grill. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Greulich

customer_reviews.title: Solid customer service.  Excellent grill for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Solid grill for the price. Compatible with a bunch of aftermarket upgrades. Customer service was awesome; sent email about unknown parts that weren't mentioned in the manual and got a reply within minutes. Turns out these were 'bonus' parts to hang cooking tools on grill. Not to mention that I sent the email after hours and STILL got an immediate reply!!
customer_reviews.author: David Macayaon

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple pellet grill
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim and didn’t do much research. Assembled easy, seems rugged, had a problem on start up, wrote an email to the company and they sent out a new controller the same day and has been running great ever since. If you’re looking for a basic pellet grill I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe K.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing grill
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, works great. I’ve smoked a prime rib and burgers and a pork loin and they turned out amazing. Not very Smokey flavor.
customer_reviews.author: robertlyons

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I received the smoker and found a defective part. I contacted their customer service department and the sent me a replacement part immediately. I am very pleased with the smoker and their response to a problem. Bill K Aurora, CO
customer_reviews.author: Bill K in Aurora, CO

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Love the smoker. Well made, easy to assemble and easy to use. Had a minor problem with the handle and they had a brand new one for me within 3 days. Great customer service. Would recommend to anyone to give a try.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Allen

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: This smoker does everything it says it will do. Easy to assemble, sturdy, excellent temp. control, a great product.
customer_reviews.author: kim hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Better than charcoal!
customer_reviews.text: I like the wood pellet smoking grill. Easy to set up. Cleaner than charcoal grill. Nice smoky flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This grill rocks💜
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing grill. Sturdy and built well. Cooks great. We absolutely love it.
